column5: Talked to the office at Mahkwa today and was told road and bridge are open. Sure will be nice to drive right to camp. Only problem it'll be 8 more months.

Did your Mahkwa contact mention anything about the boat landing that is/was to be built at the resort. Eliminating the ned to launch your boat at Archie's Landing. I was told in August that this (the boat landing) was also to be completed this year.
No they didn't say anything about launch. I'll call them again, maybe tomorrow.
Talked to Roger Bull today and was told new landing was put in last week. So we can now drive to and launch at camp.
